message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,100,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to go up to $1,000,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to go up to $1,000,000, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,050,000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this unique item.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  I'm still a bit tight on budget, but I'm willing to go up to $1,025,000.  This is my final offer, so let me know if you're willing to accept it.

I understand that you're trying to be mindful of your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1,025,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $1,075,000. This is my final counteroffer, and I hope you'll consider it.
